00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_SEC
00042 #include <linux/init.h>
00043 #include <linux/module.h>
00044 #include <linux/slab.h>
00045 #include <linux/dcache.h>
00046 #include <linux/fs.h>
00047 #include <linux/mutex.h>
00048 #include <linux/crypto.h>
00049 
00050 #include <obd.h>
00051 #include <obd_class.h>
00052 #include <obd_support.h>
00053 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00054 #include <lustre_net.h>
00055 #include <lustre_import.h>

00058 #include "gss_err.h"
00059 #include "gss_internal.h"
00060 #include "gss_api.h"
00061 
00062 int gss_cli_ctx_wrap_bulk(struct ptlrpc_cli_ctx *ctx,
00063                           struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00064                           struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00065 {
00066         struct gss_cli_ctx              *gctx;
00067         struct lustre_msg               *msg;
00068         struct ptlrpc_bulk_sec_desc     *bsd;
00069         rawobj_t                         token;
00070         __u32                            maj;
00071         int                              offset;
00072         int                              rc;
00073         ENTRY;
00074 
00075         LASSERT(req->rq_pack_bulk);
00076         LASSERT(req->rq_bulk_read || req->rq_bulk_write);
00077         LASSERT(ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kiov(desc->bd_type));
00078 
00079         gctx = container_of(ctx, struct gss_cli_ctx, gc_base);
00080         LASSERT(gctx->gc_mechctx);
00081 
00082         switch (SPTLRPC_FLVR_SVC(req->rq_flvr.sf_rpc)) {
00083         case SPTLRPC_SVC_NULL:
00084                 LASSERT(req->rq_reqbuf->lm_bufcount >= 3);
00085                 msg = req->rq_reqbuf;
00086                 offset = msg->lm_bufcount - 1;
00087                 break;
00088         case SPTLRPC_SVC_AUTH:
00089         case SPTLRPC_SVC_INTG:
00090                 LASSERT(req->rq_reqbuf->lm_bufcount >= 4);
00091                 msg = req->rq_reqbuf;
00092                 offset = msg->lm_bufcount - 2;
00093                 break;
00094         case SPTLRPC_SVC_PRIV:
00095                 LASSERT(req->rq_clrbuf->lm_bufcount >= 2);
00096                 msg = req->rq_clrbuf;
00097                 offset = msg->lm_bufcount - 1;
00098                 break;
00099         default:
00100                 LBUG();
00101         }
00102 
00103         bsd = lustre_msg_buf(msg, offset, sizeof(*bsd));
00104         bsd->bsd_version = 0;
00105         bsd->bsd_flags = 0;
00106         bsd->bsd_type = SPTLRPC_BULK_DEFAULT;
00107         bsd->bsd_svc = SPTLRPC_FLVR_BULK_SVC(req->rq_flvr.sf_rpc);
00108 
00109         if (bsd->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_NULL)
00110                 RETURN(0);
00111 
00112         LASSERT(bsd->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_INTG ||
00113                 bsd->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV);
00114 
00115         if (req->rq_bulk_read) {
00116                 /*
00117                  * bulk read: prepare receiving pages only for privacy mode.
00118                  */
00119                 if (bsd->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV)
00120                         return gss_cli_prep_bulk(req, desc);
00121         } else {
00122                 /*
00123                  * bulk write: sign or encrypt bulk pages.
00124                  */
00125                 bsd->bsd_nob = desc->bd_nob;
00126 
00127                 if (bsd->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_INTG) {
00128                         /* integrity mode */
00129                         token.data = bsd->bsd_data;
00130                         token.len = lustre_msg_buflen(msg, offset) -
00131                                     sizeof(*bsd);
00132 
00133                         maj = lgss_get_mic(gctx->gc_mechctx, 0, NULL,
00134                                            desc->bd_iov_count,
00135                                            GET_KIOV(desc),
00136                                            &token);
00137                         if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00138                                 CWARN("failed to sign bulk data: %x\n", maj);
00139                                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00140                         }
00141                 } else {
00142                         /* privacy mode */
00143                         if (desc->bd_iov_count == 0)
00144                                 RETURN(0);
00145 
00146                         rc = sptlrpc_enc_pool_get_pages(desc);
00147                         if (rc) {
00148                                 CERROR("bulk write: failed to allocate "
00149                                        "encryption pages: %d\n", rc);
00150                                 RETURN(rc);
00151                         }
00152 
00153                         token.data = bsd->bsd_data;
00154                         token.len = lustre_msg_buflen(msg, offset) -
00155                                     sizeof(*bsd);
00156 
00157                         maj = lgss_wrap_bulk(gctx->gc_mechctx, desc, &token, 0);
00158                         if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00159                                 CWARN("fail to encrypt bulk data: %x\n", maj);
00160                                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00161                         }
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 
00165         RETURN(0);
00166 }
00167 
00168 int gss_cli_ctx_unwrap_bulk(struct ptlrpc_cli_ctx *ctx,
00169                             struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00170                             struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00171 {
00172         struct gss_cli_ctx              *gctx;
00173         struct lustre_msg               *rmsg, *vmsg;
00174         struct ptlrpc_bulk_sec_desc     *bsdr, *bsdv;
00175         rawobj_t                         token;
00176         __u32                            maj;
00177         int                              roff, voff;
00178         ENTRY;
00179 
00180         LASSERT(req->rq_pack_bulk);
00181         LASSERT(req->rq_bulk_read || req->rq_bulk_write);
00182         LASSERT(ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kiov(desc->bd_type));
00183 
00184         switch (SPTLRPC_FLVR_SVC(req->rq_flvr.sf_rpc)) {
00185         case SPTLRPC_SVC_NULL:
00186                 vmsg = req->rq_repdata;
00187                 LASSERT(vmsg != NULL && vmsg->lm_bufcount >= 3);
00188                 voff = vmsg->lm_bufcount - 1;
00189 
00190                 rmsg = req->rq_reqbuf;
00191                 LASSERT(rmsg != NULL && rmsg->lm_bufcount >= 3);
00192                 roff = rmsg->lm_bufcount - 1; /* last segment */
00193                 break;
00194         case SPTLRPC_SVC_AUTH:
00195         case SPTLRPC_SVC_INTG:
00196                 vmsg = req->rq_repdata;
00197                 LASSERT(vmsg != NULL && vmsg->lm_bufcount >= 4);
00198                 voff = vmsg->lm_bufcount - 2;
00199 
00200                 rmsg = req->rq_reqbuf;
00201                 LASSERT(rmsg != NULL && rmsg->lm_bufcount >= 4);
00202                 roff = rmsg->lm_bufcount - 2; /* second last segment */
00203                 break;
00204         case SPTLRPC_SVC_PRIV:
00205                 vmsg = req->rq_repdata;
00206                 LASSERT(vmsg != NULL && vmsg->lm_bufcount >= 2);
00207                 voff = vmsg->lm_bufcount - 1;
00208 
00209                 rmsg = req->rq_clrbuf;
00210                 LASSERT(rmsg != NULL && rmsg->lm_bufcount >= 2);
00211                 roff = rmsg->lm_bufcount - 1; /* last segment */
00212                 break;
00213         default:
00214                 LBUG();
00215         }
00216 
00217         bsdr = lustre_msg_buf(rmsg, roff, sizeof(*bsdr));
00218         bsdv = lustre_msg_buf(vmsg, voff, sizeof(*bsdv));
00219         LASSERT(bsdr && bsdv);
00220 
00221         if (bsdr->bsd_version != bsdv->bsd_version ||
00222             bsdr->bsd_type != bsdv->bsd_type ||
00223             bsdr->bsd_svc != bsdv->bsd_svc) {
00224                 CERROR("bulk security descriptor mismatch: "
00225                        "(%u,%u,%u) != (%u,%u,%u)\n",
00226                        bsdr->bsd_version, bsdr->bsd_type, bsdr->bsd_svc,
00227                        bsdv->bsd_version, bsdv->bsd_type, bsdv->bsd_svc);
00228                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
00229         }
00230 
00231         LASSERT(bsdv->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_NULL ||
00232                 bsdv->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_INTG ||
00233                 bsdv->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV);
00234 
00235         /*
00236          * in privacy mode if return success, make sure bd_nob_transferred
00237          * is the actual size of the clear text, otherwise upper layer
00238          * may be surprised.
00239          */
00240         if (req->rq_bulk_write) {
00241                 if (bsdv->bsd_flags & BSD_FL_ERR) {
00242                         CERROR("server reported bulk i/o failure\n");
00243                         RETURN(-EIO);
00244                 }
00245 
00246                 if (bsdv->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV)
00247                         desc->bd_nob_transferred = desc->bd_nob;
00248         } else {
00249                 /*
00250                  * bulk read, upon return success, bd_nob_transferred is
00251                  * the size of plain text actually received.
00252                  */
00253                 gctx = container_of(ctx, struct gss_cli_ctx, gc_base);
00254                 LASSERT(gctx->gc_mechctx);
00255 
00256                 if (bsdv->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_INTG) {
00257                         int i, nob;
00258 
00259                         /* fix the actual data size */
00260                         for (i = 0, nob = 0; i < desc->bd_iov_count; i++) {
00261                                 if (BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_len + nob >
00262                                     desc->bd_nob_transferred) {
00263                                         BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_len =
00264                                                 desc->bd_nob_transferred - nob;
00265                                 }
00266                                 nob += BD_GET_KIOV(desc, i).kiov_len;
00267                         }
00268 
00269                         token.data = bsdv->bsd_data;
00270                         token.len = lustre_msg_buflen(vmsg, voff) -
00271                                     sizeof(*bsdv);
00272 
00273                         maj = lgss_verify_mic(gctx->gc_mechctx, 0, NULL,
00274                                               desc->bd_iov_count,
00275                                               GET_KIOV(desc),
00276                                               &token);
00277                         if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00278                                 CERROR("failed to verify bulk read: %x\n", maj);
00279                                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00280                         }
00281                 } else if (bsdv->bsd_svc == SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV) {
00282                         desc->bd_nob = bsdv->bsd_nob;
00283                         if (desc->bd_nob == 0)
00284                                 RETURN(0);
00285 
00286                         token.data = bsdv->bsd_data;
00287                         token.len = lustre_msg_buflen(vmsg, voff) -
00288                                     sizeof(*bsdr);
00289 
00290                         maj = lgss_unwrap_bulk(gctx->gc_mechctx, desc,
00291                                                &token, 1);
00292                         if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00293                                 CERROR("failed to decrypt bulk read: %x\n",
00294                                        maj);
00295                                 RETURN(-EACCES);
00296                         }
00297 
00298                         desc->bd_nob_transferred = desc->bd_nob;
00299                 }
00300         }
00301 
00302         RETURN(0);
00303 }
00304 
00305 static int gss_prep_bulk(struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
00306                          struct gss_ctx *mechctx)
00307 {
00308         int     rc;
00309 
00310         if (desc->bd_iov_count == 0)
00311                 return 0;
00312 
00313         rc = sptlrpc_enc_pool_get_pages(desc);
00314         if (rc)
00315                 return rc;
00316 
00317         if (lgss_prep_bulk(mechctx, desc) != GSS_S_COMPLETE)
00318                 return -EACCES;
00319 
00320         return 0;
00321 }
00322 
00323 int gss_cli_prep_bulk(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00324                       struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00325 {
00326         int             rc;
00327         ENTRY;
00328 
00329         LASSERT(req->rq_cli_ctx);
00330         LASSERT(req->rq_pack_bulk);
00331         LASSERT(req->rq_bulk_read);
00332 
00333         if (SPTLRPC_FLVR_BULK_SVC(req->rq_flvr.sf_rpc) != SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV)
00334                 RETURN(0);
00335 
00336         rc = gss_prep_bulk(desc, ctx2gctx(req->rq_cli_ctx)->gc_mechctx);
00337         if (rc)
00338                 CERROR("bulk read: failed to prepare encryption "
00339                        "pages: %d\n", rc);
00340 
00341         RETURN(rc);
00342 }
00343 
00344 int gss_svc_prep_bulk(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00345                       struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00346 {
00347         struct gss_svc_reqctx        *grctx;
00348         struct ptlrpc_bulk_sec_desc  *bsd;
00349         int                           rc;
00350         ENTRY;
00351 
00352         LASSERT(req->rq_svc_ctx);
00353         LASSERT(req->rq_pack_bulk);
00354         LASSERT(req->rq_bulk_write);
00355 
00356         grctx = gss_svc_ctx2reqctx(req->rq_svc_ctx);
00357         LASSERT(grctx->src_reqbsd);
00358         LASSERT(grctx->src_repbsd);
00359         LASSERT(grctx->src_ctx);
00360         LASSERT(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx);
00361 
00362         bsd = grctx->src_reqbsd;
00363         if (bsd->bsd_svc != SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV)
00364                 RETURN(0);
00365 
00366         rc = gss_prep_bulk(desc, grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx);
00367         if (rc)
00368                 CERROR("bulk write: failed to prepare encryption "
00369                        "pages: %d\n", rc);
00370 
00371         RETURN(rc);
00372 }
00373 
00374 int gss_svc_unwrap_bulk(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00375                         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00376 {
00377         struct gss_svc_reqctx        *grctx;
00378         struct ptlrpc_bulk_sec_desc  *bsdr, *bsdv;
00379         rawobj_t                      token;
00380         __u32                         maj;
00381         ENTRY;
00382 
00383         LASSERT(req->rq_svc_ctx);
00384         LASSERT(req->rq_pack_bulk);
00385         LASSERT(req->rq_bulk_write);
00386         LASSERT(ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kiov(desc->bd_type));
00387 
00388         grctx = gss_svc_ctx2reqctx(req->rq_svc_ctx);
00389 
00390         LASSERT(grctx->src_reqbsd);
00391         LASSERT(grctx->src_repbsd);
00392         LASSERT(grctx->src_ctx);
00393         LASSERT(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx);
00394 
00395         bsdr = grctx->src_reqbsd;
00396         bsdv = grctx->src_repbsd;
00397 
00398         /* bsdr has been sanity checked during unpacking */
00399         bsdv->bsd_version = 0;
00400         bsdv->bsd_type = SPTLRPC_BULK_DEFAULT;
00401         bsdv->bsd_svc = bsdr->bsd_svc;
00402         bsdv->bsd_flags = 0;
00403 
00404         switch (bsdv->bsd_svc) {
00405         case SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_INTG:
00406                 token.data = bsdr->bsd_data;
00407                 token.len = grctx->src_reqbsd_size - sizeof(*bsdr);
00408 
00409                 maj = lgss_verify_mic(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx, 0, NULL,
00410                                       desc->bd_iov_count,
00411                                       GET_KIOV(desc), &token);
00412                 if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00413                         bsdv->bsd_flags |= BSD_FL_ERR;
00414                         CERROR("failed to verify bulk signature: %x\n", maj);
00415                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00416                 }
00417                 break;
00418         case SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV:
00419                 if (bsdr->bsd_nob != desc->bd_nob) {
00420                         bsdv->bsd_flags |= BSD_FL_ERR;
00421                         CERROR("prepared nob %d doesn't match the actual "
00422                                "nob %d\n", desc->bd_nob, bsdr->bsd_nob);
00423                         RETURN(-EPROTO);
00424                 }
00425 
00426                 if (desc->bd_iov_count == 0) {
00427                         LASSERT(desc->bd_nob == 0);
00428                         break;
00429                 }
00430 
00431                 token.data = bsdr->bsd_data;
00432                 token.len = grctx->src_reqbsd_size - sizeof(*bsdr);
00433 
00434                 maj = lgss_unwrap_bulk(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx,
00435                                        desc, &token, 0);
00436                 if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00437                         bsdv->bsd_flags |= BSD_FL_ERR;
00438                         CERROR("failed decrypt bulk data: %x\n", maj);
00439                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00440                 }
00441 
00442                 /* mimic gss_cli_ctx_unwrap_bulk */
00443                 desc->bd_nob_transferred = desc->bd_nob;
00444 
00445                 break;
00446         }
00447 
00448         RETURN(0);
00449 }
00450 
00451 int gss_svc_wrap_bulk(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00452                       struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc)
00453 {
00454         struct gss_svc_reqctx        *grctx;
00455         struct ptlrpc_bulk_sec_desc  *bsdr, *bsdv;
00456         rawobj_t                      token;
00457         __u32                         maj;
00458         int                           rc;
00459         ENTRY;
00460 
00461         LASSERT(req->rq_svc_ctx);
00462         LASSERT(req->rq_pack_bulk);
00463         LASSERT(req->rq_bulk_read);
00464         LASSERT(ptlrpc_is_bulk_desc_kiov(desc->bd_type));
00465 
00466         grctx = gss_svc_ctx2reqctx(req->rq_svc_ctx);
00467 
00468         LASSERT(grctx->src_reqbsd);
00469         LASSERT(grctx->src_repbsd);
00470         LASSERT(grctx->src_ctx);
00471         LASSERT(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx);
00472 
00473         bsdr = grctx->src_reqbsd;
00474         bsdv = grctx->src_repbsd;
00475 
00476         /* bsdr has been sanity checked during unpacking */
00477         bsdv->bsd_version = 0;
00478         bsdv->bsd_type = SPTLRPC_BULK_DEFAULT;
00479         bsdv->bsd_svc = bsdr->bsd_svc;
00480         bsdv->bsd_flags = 0;
00481 
00482         switch (bsdv->bsd_svc) {
00483         case SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_INTG:
00484                 token.data = bsdv->bsd_data;
00485                 token.len = grctx->src_repbsd_size - sizeof(*bsdv);
00486 
00487                 maj = lgss_get_mic(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx, 0, NULL,
00488                                    desc->bd_iov_count,
00489                                    GET_KIOV(desc), &token);
00490                 if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00491                         bsdv->bsd_flags |= BSD_FL_ERR;
00492                         CERROR("failed to sign bulk data: %x\n", maj);
00493                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00494                 }
00495                 break;
00496         case SPTLRPC_BULK_SVC_PRIV:
00497                 bsdv->bsd_nob = desc->bd_nob;
00498 
00499                 if (desc->bd_iov_count == 0) {
00500                         LASSERT(desc->bd_nob == 0);
00501                         break;
00502                 }
00503 
00504                 rc = sptlrpc_enc_pool_get_pages(desc);
00505                 if (rc) {
00506                         bsdv->bsd_flags |= BSD_FL_ERR;
00507                         CERROR("bulk read: failed to allocate encryption "
00508                                "pages: %d\n", rc);
00509                         RETURN(rc);
00510                 }
00511 
00512                 token.data = bsdv->bsd_data;
00513                 token.len = grctx->src_repbsd_size - sizeof(*bsdv);
00514 
00515                 maj = lgss_wrap_bulk(grctx->src_ctx->gsc_mechctx,
00516                                      desc, &token, 1);
00517                 if (maj != GSS_S_COMPLETE) {
00518                         bsdv->bsd_flags |= BSD_FL_ERR;
00519                         CERROR("failed to encrypt bulk data: %x\n", maj);
00520                         RETURN(-EACCES);
00521                 }
00522                 break;
00523         }
00524 
00525         RETURN(0);
00526 }
